title: Bug 104630: Column icons are not shown when connecting to a Derby database
OB: Column icons are not shown when connecting to a Derby database.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:

1. Create a new project.
2. Create a new report.
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source and connect to a Derby database with the following configuration:
   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
   - User Name: root
   - Password: root
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset.
5. In the Edit Data Set window, select 'Query'.
6.
